sentences.en: A dividing wall painted aslate grey takes a sculptural quality in this open and airy space.
sentences.cn: 进门后,过道与餐厅的分隔墙漆成了深灰色,让这个通畅的开放空间更具立体感.

sentences.en: A sculptural, sloping roof unites an underground lobby with the covered inner court.
sentences.cn: 阿雕塑, 坡屋面的地下大厅团结的范围内院.

sentences.en: Arguably, the work may be seen as a cross between architectural form and sculptural form.
sentences.cn: 也许颇有争议地是: 本作品的最终形式会被视于介于建筑和雕塑两者之间.

sentences.en: Curving ramps connect across pool to sculptural eye and box.
sentences.cn: 旋转的坡道连接水池和眼睛形状的大楼.

sentences.en: He adopts a playful and jovial approach in telling the story of his characters sculptural installations.
sentences.cn: 他以有趣及愉快的方式诉说其凋塑人物的故事.

sentences.en: He enjoyed working with clay as a sculptural form.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢用黏土来做雕塑。

sentences.en: His sculptural arts flew his own colors.
sentences.cn: 他的雕刻技艺独树一帜.

sentences.en: Its collection includes glassworks, and large sculptural cabinets made of acrylic, aluminum and tropical wood.
sentences.cn: 它设计了包涵玻璃作品,大型的塑料 、 铝和热带木材制成的雕塑状的柜子.

sentences.en: She attempted to look reserved ; her face put on a sculptural severity.
sentences.cn: 她努力装作不说不笑的样子,把脸绷得象石雕泥塑一样严肃.

sentences.en: The Hearst Castle in California houses the Nine Muses Sarcophagus , a 3 rd Century sculptural masterpiece.
sentences.cn: 在加利福尼亚的赫斯特城堡的缪斯石棺, 九3世纪的雕塑的杰作.

sentences.en: They are in harmony with the architecture of the museum and are considered successful sculptural works.
sentences.cn: 它与农展馆的主体建筑和谐地统一起来,被公认为成功之作.

sentences.en: This research will cause more and more people to study sculptural process aesthetics in the future.
sentences.cn: 这也为以后的雕塑过程美学研究抛砖引玉.

words.tran_cn: 用刻纹装饰的；具刻纹的
雕刻；用雕塑装饰（sculpture的过去式）
